//Generated by BehavEd


affect ( "first_talker", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	use ( "sec_trigger" );
	set ( "SET_STATIONARY", "OFF" );
	set ( "SET_RELEASE_ONCONTACT", "ON" );
	sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_VOICE, "sound/enemy/russian/soldier/call_for_reinforcements.mp3" );
}


affect ( "sec_talker", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	set ( "SET_STATIONARY", "OFF" );
	set ( "SET_RELEASE_ONCONTACT", "ON" );
}
